snippet: Memoirs by the divorce lawyer Raoul Felder and by the founding dean of CUNY’s journalism school, and three volumes on Jews in New York.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books Reflections in a Mirror: Of Love, Loss, Death and Divorce by Raoul Felder, Deadlines and Disruption: My Turbulent Path From Print to Digital by Stephen B Shepard and City of Promises: A History of the Jews of New York, a three volume set compiled by four historians.
lead_paragraph: Memoirs by the divorce lawyer Raoul Felder and by the founding dean of CUNY’s journalism school, and three volumes on Jews in New York.

headline.seo: Books on Divorce, the News Business and Jews in New York
